text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia lukisii is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The size of the shell varies between 1.5 mm and 4 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
Atlantic Ocean : off the Azores and West Africa.
European waters (ERMS scope)
United Kingdom Exclusive Economic Zone
Mediterranean Sea : Greek Exclusive Economic Zone and Southwest Coast of Apulia
